extracted_playbook.title: Check REST API Access Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Examine the vManage REST API log file located at /var/log/nms/vmanage-server.log for any access attempts.
commands: grep 'Request Stored in Map is (/dataservice/client/server) for user (admin)' /var/log/nms/vmanage-server.log

extracted_playbook.condition: Is updating the affected software version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Cisco SD-WAN vManage Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected Cisco SD-WAN vManage software to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Access Control Lists (ACLs)
extracted_playbook.description: Enable ACLs to limit access to the vManage instance and reduce the attack surface.
